Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its category and I believe it can significantly benefit your business or personal needs. Given its high value to you, I propose an exclusive offer at $9500. This price reflects not only the product's quality but also the opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
